body.name: Best Choice Products 6ft Plastic Folding Table, Indoor Outdoor Heavy Duty Portable w/Handle, Lock for Picnic, Party, Camping - White

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Best Choice Products Store

features: HEAVY-DUTY TABLE TOP: Place food, drinks, and much more on the strong, easy-to-clean table top with high-quality plastic up to 17% thicker than other brands, plus 3x the weight capacity at 300 lbs.
INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Versatile use makes it perfect as a dining or game table for outdoor cookouts or birthday parties, or as a serving or display table for indoor events
STURDY SUPPORT: Powder-coated steel legs, frame joint locks, and non-slip rubber feet help to keep the table in place during every event
PORTABLE: Foldable design includes a side lock and handle, making it easy to take on the go or store away in a compact space when not in use

EASY ASSEMBLY: Table is ready for use right out of the box; simply unfold it, lock the legs to keep it sturdy, and your table is good to go!; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 72"(L) x 30"(W) x 30"(H); Weight Capacity: 300 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Best Choice Products 4ft Plastic Folding Table proves to be a versatile solution for various needs. With just enough space for crafting, this table caters to creative endeavors, making it a practical choice for DIY enthusiasts. Its outdoor adaptability adds another dimension to its utility, making it suitable for a range of activities.The heavy-duty design ensures durability, providing a reliable surface for crafting or any other task you might undertake. The portability factor, complemented by the built-in handle, enhances convenience. This feature becomes particularly advantageous when used outdoors, turning picnics, parties, or camping trips into seamless experiences.The locking mechanism adds an extra layer of stability, ensuring the table remains sturdy during use. This attention to detail is crucial, especially when engaged in activities that demand a stable surface.In terms of aesthetics, the black color adds a touch of sophistication, blending well with various settings. Whether indoors or outdoors, this folding table effortlessly complements its surroundings.In conclusion, the Best Choice Products 4ft Plastic Folding Table stands out as a reliable, portable, and versatile piece of furniture. Its thoughtful design and durability make it an excellent choice for those seeking a practical solution for crafting, outdoor activities, or casual gatherings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, affordable table, tough to stand up by yourself
reviews.reviewText: I love this table, it is the perfect size. As a 50+ year old woman, I found it a bit heavy to carry by myself, however, I really wanted a 6 ft table so I will maybe get a hand truck to make it easier to transport. I had trouble getting it to stand up by itself. When I tried to stand it up on one side, I found the opposite leg would fold under and vice versa. I wish there was something I could use to lock it in the middle to help it stand up so I wouldn't need assistance to get it up. However, once it is up, it is sturdy and there is no fear of the table folding into itself while standing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and stable.
reviews.reviewText: I make and sell jewelry and use a folding table to go to fairs. My old 18 year old table finally broke and I was looking for a new one. This one caught my attention simply because it is black in color since I personally have "things" against white plastic furniture. It's just white plastic looks "cheaper" to my taste:). I'm so glad I took a chance and bought this table (since at the time it was not reviewed yet ). This table is exactly what I was hoping for and compared to the old one it has more pluses in design and functionality. The edges of the table are more rounded. The plastic is thicker and looks more durable. The metal parts are well welded. The locking mechanism of the legs slides easily and is designed to eliminate any possibility of losing it (see photo). It's very stable. Does not have a bad odor either. When the table is unfolded, there is no gap between the two parts. In the folded position the thickness of the table is approx. 3 and 3/8 inches. The surface of the table has a matte finish. The table has some weight (compared to my old one), maybe for someone this is a disadvantage in the sense of carrying it, but for me it is a plus as I had a couple of times when at the fair some kids were not behaving well (to say the least...) bumping into my lighter old table and flipping my stuff on the floor. The unfolding mechanism is a bit tight, but personally I prefer more tight than loose, however for a person with bad arthritis it might be a bit of a challenge to unfold the table.... Hard to say... I don't have this problem and only notice it in comparison to my old table. Perhaps it will become more loose with time and use. In addition to the above, the box arrived earlier than promised and the packaging was decent. I bought this table on prime big sale days and would highly recommend this table.
